It offers programming focused on interpreting signs of the times, spiritual preparedness, and understanding the prophetic messages in the Bible to guide viewers in their faith journey.

programme.title: White Horse Media
programme.desc: Many teach the Ten Commandments were just for Jews; discovering proof that the commandments are unchangeable, reveal God's character, point to the grace of Jesus Christ, and play a major role in end-time prophecy.

programme.title: Revelation Insights
programme.desc: Modern insights from the book of Revelation.

programme.title: 3ABN Worship Hour
programme.desc: It is vital that everyone, by the grace and strength of God, do their part in separating themselves from sin and deal with open sin as He has instructed them to do so, since they have all fallen short of the glory of God as sinners.

programme.title: 3ABN Homecoming
programme.desc: Powerful speakers and inspiring music.

programme.title: Salvation in Symbols and Signs
programme.desc: Hosts James Rafferty and Ivor Myers, along with a panel of experts, examine the themes and symbolism of salvation in the Bible.

programme.title: Timeless Healing Insights
programme.desc: Dr David DeRose shares insights into healing through biblical teachings and encourages viewers to walk the path of spirituality.

programme.title: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel
programme.desc: The host teams up with a panel of religious scholars to conduct various discussions that provide an in-depth analysis on the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Anchor School of Theology: Prophetic Principles
programme.desc: With Stephen Bohr.

programme.title: Revelation Now
programme.desc: Review of modern history in connection with the Bible.

programme.title: Eleventh Hour Evidence
programme.desc: In-depth presentations and several different sermons.

programme.title: Life Discovery Series
programme.desc: Live and grow through a fresh understanding of the Scriptures; hosted by Jim Reinking.

programme.title: 3ABN On the Road
programme.desc: Cameras go on the road to exciting events across the country.

programme.title: 3ABN Homecoming
programme.desc: Powerful speakers and inspiring music.

programme.title: Thunder in the Holy Land
programme.desc: A documentary-style Bible study from young reporters exploring the teachings of Jesus; Charles Byrd.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: Free Indeed
programme.desc: Giving prisoners a chance to explain how they came to Jesus; hosted by C.A. Murray.

programme.title: Breath of Life
programme.desc: Breath of Life presents the gospel of Jesus Christ from a contemporary, urban perspective.

programme.title: Revelation Insights
programme.desc: Modern insights from the book of Revelation.

programme.desc: Inspirational teaching from Pioneer Memorial Church in Berrien Springs, MI.

programme.desc: Inspiring messages along with reports from the former Soviet Union countries.
